page.title: 08Communications In Inverarity
page.content: Inverarity is situated at a junction of minor roads leading to the east,west and south of the village.It is approximately 1km east of the A929 Forfar to Dundee road.Around Inverarity there is a network of minor country roads leeding to Carrot Hill and east to Whigstreet and other small communities.Most of the minor roads in the area are not of particularly good quality as many of them have dips or holes in them.The A929 at the moment is being improved and updated by being formed into a dual carriageway.This is to help the road cope with the load of traffic travelling on it to Dundee and towards the Tay Road Bridge and also the traffic travelling north to Aberdeen.
